Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.web

Classes to aid integration with Java EE.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JNDIContextFilter ServletFilter than may be used to set up a LoggerContext for each web application.
Log4jContextListener Saves the LoggerContext into the ServletContext as an attribute.
 

Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.web Description

Classes to aid integration with Java EE.
